name: Low-Fat Greek Yogurt Ranch Dip
author: Lee Crowell
summary: This Greek yogurt ranch dip is super quick and easy and low-fat or fat-free. Tailor it to your needs by choosing your favorite plain yogurt and dressing mix. The dip can be used as a dressing by tossing it into a salad, but I would not recommend watering it down for easier pouring, as this will seriously affect the flavor and consistency.
ingredients: 1 (0.4 oz) package buttermilk ranch dressing mix
directions: Mix ranch dressing mix into yogurt, stirring thoroughly until evenly distributed and smooth
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving for best flavor
